name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 13 years of experience specializing in high-performance application development. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Node.js**, demonstrating extensive experience with **React**, **Express**, and **REST API** technologies. Skilled in cloud computing with hands-on experience in deploying applications on **AWS** and utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure as code.

Expert in modern development practices including microservices architecture, CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions** and **Jenkins**, and container orchestration with **Kubernetes**. Proven track record of building robust backend systems using **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, ensuring data integrity and performance. 

Possesses strong analytical skills in compliance-driven environments, ensuring adherence to industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. A proactive collaborator with a strong background in developing solutions that leverage AI/ML technologies to enhance user experiences in both healthcare and financial sectors.
